amendment.description: To reduce continuing funding by 15 percent, except for the Department of Defense, military construction, and the Department of Veterans Affairs and to rescind $30,000,000,000 from enforcement funds provided to the Internal Revenue Service.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1366 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 32 - 65. Record Vote Number: 311.

action.text: Amendment SA 1366 proposed by Senator Paul. (consideration: CR S5527-5528) To reduce continuing funding by 15 percent, except for the Department of Defense, military construction, and the Department of Veterans Affairs and to rescind $30,000,000,000 from enforcement funds provided to the Internal Revenue Service.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1366 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 32 - 65. Record Vote Number: 311.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1366 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 32 - 65. Record Vote Number: 311.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1366 proposed by Senator Paul.
